docs.lead_paragraph: New York City police said on Sunday there was no indication of vandalism after several headstones were found toppled at a predominately Jewish cemetery in Brooklyn over the weekend.

headline.print_headline: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery
headline.main: New York Police Say No Vandalism at Jewish Cemetery

docs.snippet: New York City police said on Sunday there was no indication of vandalism after several headstones were found toppled at a predominately Jewish cemetery in Brooklyn over the weekend....

docs.lead_paragraph: Iran and neighboring Azerbaijan agreed on Sunday to work towards completing their portion of a planned freight railway route from Europe to South Asia, Iranian state media reported.

headline.print_headline: Iran and Azerbaijan to Join Railways as Part of Freight Route
headline.main: Iran and Azerbaijan to Join Railways as Part of Freight Route

docs.snippet: Iran and neighboring Azerbaijan agreed on Sunday to work towards completing their portion of a planned freight railway route from Europe to South Asia, Iranian state media reported....

docs.lead_paragraph: Filmmaker Gabrielle Burton says she didn't plan for her documentary about the drag scene in Ohio's capital city to achieve wider distribution at a time of political and cultural division.

headline.print_headline: Documentary Explores Drag Scene in City of the US Heartland
headline.main: Documentary Explores Drag Scene in City of the US Heartland

docs.snippet: Filmmaker Gabrielle Burton says she didn't plan for her documentary about the drag scene in Ohio's capital city to achieve wider distribution at a time of political and cultural division....

docs.lead_paragraph: The White House asked the U.S. Congress on Sunday to examine whether the Obama administration abused its investigative authority during the 2016 campaign, as part of an ongoing congressional probe into Russia's influence on the election.

headline.print_headline: White House Asks Congress to Probe Trump's Accusation of Obama Wiretap
headline.main: White House Asks Congress to Probe Trump's Accusation of Obama Wiretap

docs.snippet: The White House asked the U.S. Congress on Sunday to examine whether the Obama administration abused its investigative authority during the 2016 campaign, as part of an ongoing congressional probe into Russia's influence on the election....

docs.lead_paragraph: Zimbabwean junior doctors on Sunday called off a three-week strike saying the government had partially met their demands, a day before a one-day walk out by other public sector workers.

headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Doctors Call Off Strike Ahead of Civil Service Walk-Out
headline.main: Zimbabwe Doctors Call Off Strike Ahead of Civil Service Walk-Out

docs.snippet: Zimbabwean junior doctors on Sunday called off a three-week strike saying the government had partially met their demands, a day before a one-day walk out by other public sector workers....

docs.lead_paragraph: Egyptian intelligence has hired two U.S. public relations firms in Washington to lobby on the country's behalf and boost its image, the first such engagements by the country's powerful security apparatus to be made public.

headline.print_headline: Egypt's Mukhabarat Hires Washington Lobbyists to Boost Image
headline.main: Egypt's Mukhabarat Hires Washington Lobbyists to Boost Image

docs.snippet: Egyptian intelligence has hired two U.S. public relations firms in Washington to lobby on the country's behalf and boost its image, the first such engagements by the country's powerful security apparatus to be made public....

docs.lead_paragraph: Australian qualifier Ashleigh Barty breezed past Japan's Nao Hibino 6-3 6-2 in a rain-hit Malaysian Open final to win her first WTA singles title in Kuala Lumpur on Sunday and break into the world's top 100 for the first time.

headline.print_headline: Barty Beats Hibino to Win Malaysian Open
headline.main: Barty Beats Hibino to Win Malaysian Open

docs.snippet: Australian qualifier Ashleigh Barty breezed past Japan's Nao Hibino 6-3 6-2 in a rain-hit Malaysian Open final to win her first WTA singles title in Kuala Lumpur on Sunday and break into the world's top 100 for the first time....

docs.lead_paragraph: The total number of civilians displaced from Mosul has risen sharply over the past days and exceeded 200,000 on Sunday, according to the International Organization for Migration (IOM).

headline.print_headline: Total Number of People Displaced From Mosul Exceeds 200,000: IOM
headline.main: Total Number of People Displaced From Mosul Exceeds 200,000: IOM

docs.snippet: The total number of civilians displaced from Mosul has risen sharply over the past days and exceeded 200,000 on Sunday, according to the International Organization for Migration (IOM)....

docs.lead_paragraph: A Russian lawmaker has proposed an unorthodox solution to the country's problems with soccer hooliganism ahead of next year's World Cup — legalize it and make it a spectator sport.

headline.print_headline: Russian Lawmaker Aims to Make Football Hooliganism a Sport
headline.main: Russian Lawmaker Aims to Make Football Hooliganism a Sport

docs.snippet: A Russian lawmaker has proposed an unorthodox solution to the country's problems with soccer hooliganism ahead of next year's World Cup — legalize it and make it a spectator sport....

docs.lead_paragraph: He once was New Jersey's highest ranking law enforcement official, a mentor to Republican Gov. Chris Christie and the head of one of the nation's most powerful transportation agencies. On Monday, David Samson's next title could be far less glamorous — federal inmate.

headline.print_headline: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case
headline.main: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case
